description.displayText: Samanthia has been a nanny for my kids for eight years now. She took care of our newborn, who is currently 8 years old and our two daughters who are now 9 & 13. Unfortunately, our kids are now able to get to and from school on their own and we don't need a nanny anymore. Samanthia was very loving, kind and fun to be around. She always communicated with our kids in the perfect manner and was always punctual. It is really heart-breaking to let Sam go and we really hope that she gets a good job, where she could share all her good qualities and love your kids as she loved ours. She's going to be the perfect choice.
